description: This Blueberry Hazelnut chocolate smoothie bowl is delicious with layers of flavor. Topped with Vega protein Peanut Butter cups. gluten-free vegan recipe
name: Blueberry Hazelnut Chocolate Hemp Smoothie bowl with Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Snack bars.
recipeIngredient: 1 packet Vega chocolate smoothie or chocolate protein powder
2 Tbsp chocolate hazelnut butter (Justin's or use plain hazelnut or other nut butter)
3 Tbsp vanilla ice cream (or 1 small frozen banana)
chopped Vega peanut butter cup snack bars or regular peanut butter cups

recipeInstructions.text: Blend everything under smoothie until smooth. Pour or scoop into serving bowls.
Top with hemp seeds, blueberries and pb snack bars or other toppings of choice.
Or blend with a bit more non dairy milk or ice cubes and drink up.
